page.title: 11EAGLESHAM PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Eaglesham School is in Gilmour Street. Most of it is fairly new but there is an old building which was the original school but is now used as the dinner hall.There are fourteen classrooms and 360 pupils to fill them up.Each pupil has a uniform.We wear light clothes in summer but all the rest of the year we wear a uniform.The uniform consists of a navy blue and yellow striped tie a grey (or white) shirt a grey jumper and grey (or black) trousers and if you are a girl a grey skirt.When we asked the children few of them liked the present school uniform.All of them hated wearing the tie.About half the children wanted a new design of uniform and just under half thought they should wear what they wanted.In the school there are 22 members of staff.Out of all the classes their favourite games are
